oogroups.com, "supercyclonus" <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> Heya! :)
> 
> =
Sandy, if you want to post your characters arriving on scene, feel free to =
do so. :) 
> 
> For the old Maximal base, If I understand it correctly, and=
 I am sure I will be corrected if I am wrong, it is the Axalon's crash site=
, which was fixed up and utilized by the Maximals during the Beast War's ca=
rtoon. Kraftlos described it a bit in Message #69458, and of course Tuscon =
left on his mission to the black fortress from there, so you should be fami=
liar with it already :) Just don't forget the huge two headed dragon floati=
ng above it. So far it has not attacked. 
> 
> Since this is Kraftlos' show=
 over there, you might want to get with him as well if you have any questio=
ns. I will help as I can :)
> 
> The Ark of course looks much like it did i=
n the old 80's cartoon, except that you have Autobots and Decepticons layin=
g around inside it . . . much like the description I gave for Quickstride's=
 benefit. Also there is a force field which Lord Elder or Kup can lower to =
let Tuscon in.
> 
> I hope this is helpful?
> 
> Preston
